summary: The Three Stooges were a famous American comedy group from 1922 to 1970. They were known for their funny, physical, and silly humor in short movies. The original group had three members: Moe, Larry, and Curly. Over time, other members joined, like Shemp, Joe Besser, and "Curly Joe" DeRita. They started with a vaudeville act and later made many short films for Columbia Pictures. The Stooges became super popular on TV in the 1960s, but the group ended when Larry got sick in 1970. People tried to restart the act, but it didn't last.
title: The Three Stooges
